Package display

Class CommandLineDisplay

java.lang.Object
display.CommandLineDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
DisplayStrategy
public class CommandLineDisplay extends Object implements DisplayStrategy
A concrete implementation of the DisplayStrategy interface for the CLI. The command line display uses the System.out to display the game and reads user input from System.in by providing options to selects from for the player.

    • displayCutscene

      public void displayCutscene(Cutscene cutscene)
      Display the given cutscene in the terminal. The cutscene loops through the slides in order until the end is reached.
      Specified by:
      displayCutscene in interface DisplayStrategy
      Parameters:
      cutscene - the cutscene to display
